name: tiddlymemo
description: Incremental Learning program based on TiddlyWiki, deepening lifelong knowledge into the Sea of Mind

scripts.serve: cross-env TIDDLYWIKI_PLUGIN_PATH=./plugins npx nodemon -e tid,multids,js,info --watch plugins ./node_modules/tiddlywiki/tiddlywiki.js . --listen
scripts.build-manual: cross-env TIDDLYWIKI_PLUGIN_PATH=./plugins npx tiddlywiki editions/manual/ --output docs/manual --build index
scripts.build-empty: cross-env TIDDLYWIKI_PLUGIN_PATH=./plugins npx tiddlywiki editions/empty/ --output docs/empty --build index
scripts.build-empty-zh-Hans: cross-env TIDDLYWIKI_PLUGIN_PATH=./plugins npx tiddlywiki editions/empty-zh-Hans/ --output docs/empty-zh-Hans --build index
scripts.build-empty-all: npm run build-empty; npm run build-empty-zh-Hans;
scripts.build-all: npm run build-manual; npm run build-empty-all;
scripts.library: npx cross-env TIDDLYWIKI_PLUGIN_PATH='./plugins' TIDDLYWIKI_THEME_PATH='./themes' TIDDLYWIKI_LANGUAGE_PATH='./languages' npx tiddlywiki . --output docs/library --build library

author: oflg
